About this sample.Sample: Wild-type SUM-159 cell, treated with 0.5 mM oleic acid for 45 mins prior to high pressure freezing to induce the formation of lipid droplets.
About this sample.Protocol: High pressure freezing, freeze-substitution resin embedding with 2% OsO<sub>4</sub> 0.1% UA 3% H<sub>2</sub>O in Acetone, resin embedding in Eponate 12.
About this sample.Contributions: Sample provided by Jeeyun Chung, Tobias Walther and Bob Farese (Harvard U.), prepared for imaging by Gleb Shtengel (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).

Dataset information.Publications: Xu et al., 2020; Heinrich et al., 2020
